title: I Want to Taste You: Girl to Girl Talk
description: Orgasm in females is a more complicated affair and often takes much longer to achieve during a session of sexual acts. This book helps you discover new sensations and provides different ways to love yourself and your partner and provides variations for your sexual pleasures.
author: Zoe Jasmine
